entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:35 a.m. MDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -5.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 9:00 AM CDT Thursday 4 May 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow

Visibility: 0.8 km

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing this morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 80 gusting to 100 late this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Blizzard. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 80 km/h gusting to 100 becoming northeast 60 gusting to 80 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Near blizzard. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending late in the morning then clearing. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 late in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
